body_html:
As you said， single image batches on CPU, it will have to load neural net parameters into cache for each image， so the loading process consume too much time ?
But in Machine Learning project we usually load the neural net parameters(or trained model) at the very beginning for only once, than we process each vali sample.
Can tensorflow load the weights Once? Cause sometimes our model can be small and won't take much cache

body:
As you said， single image batches on CPU, it will have to load neural net parameters into cache for each image， so the loading process consume too much time ?
But  in Machine Learning project we  usually load the neural net parameters(or trained model) at the very beginning for only once,  than we process each vali sample.
Can tensorflow load the weights Once? Cause sometimes our model can be small and won't take much cache
